title: Caption-Utilized Curriculum for Universal Design for Learning (UDL)

context.prior_knowledge: Basic multimedia utilization skills and experience in using educational tools
context.additional_context: Strengthening instructional design capabilities to accommodate students with diverse learning needs.

learning_goals: Learners can explain universal design for learning principles by applying subtitles to diverse educational content
Learners can create subtitles tailored to educational objectives using subtitle-authoring tools
Learners can evaluate the impact of subtitle utilization on learning engagement and content comprehension
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
